thread.title_full: New York, New York - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: arthompson222
title: New York, New York -
text: The hotel is around the corner from Times Square, and functional. Room was clean and well appointed with fridge, microwave, flatscreen TV, clocks. No tub though, and plain white duvet against brown decor (dull looking). But the front desk staff were terrific, concierge desk very helpful, and the bell hop helped me find the PATH station.
